pre industrialisation
colonial united states nuclear family common family form typical families consisted five children initially high infant mortality rates children survived adolescence colonial families existed serve six main functions self sufficient business school vocational institute church house correction welfare institution

tristan horse

unk
plunketts creek loyalsock creek
plunketts creek approximately 6 2 mile long 10 0 km tributary loyalsock creek lycoming sullivan counties us state pennsylvania two unincorporated villages hamlet creek watershed drains 23 6 square miles 61 km2 parts five townships creek part chesapeake bay drainage basin via loyalsock creek west branch susquehanna susquehanna rivers
plunketts creek unique name comes first owner land including creek mouth creek given name two townships although one since changed name creek flows southwest south dissected allegheny plateau rock unk sub period devonian period much plunketts creek valley composed various glacial deposits chiefly alluvium
although plunketts creek watershed clear cut home tannery sawmills coal mine nineteenth century today heavily wooded known high water quality fishing recreational opportunities watershed includes parts loyalsock state forest pennsylvania state game lands state game farm raising pheasant tourism hunting fishing long important region year round population increasing much faster either lycoming sullivan county
name
plunketts creek named colonel william plunkett physician first president judge northumberland county formed 1772 conflicts native americans treated wounded settlers fought natives plunkett led pennsylvania expedition unk yankee war forcibly remove settlers connecticut claimed settled lands also claimed pennsylvania services plunkett granted six tracts land totaling 1 978 acres 8 00 km2 november 14 1776 although land actually surveyed september 1783 plunkett land included creek mouth plunketts creek given name
american revolution plunkett actively support revolution thus suspected sympathetic british empire died 1791 aged 100 buried northumberland without grave marker monument except creek bears name lycoming county formed northumberland county 1795 plunketts creek township formed lycoming county 1838 original name proposed plunkett township lingering suspicions british sympathies led name rejected naming township creek acceptable compromise

fifth crusade
pope innocent proclaimed fifth crusade 1213 liberation holy land unk jerusalem principal object first crusader troops commanded leopold vi austria landed acre early september 1217 andrew ii hungary army followed month hugh cyprus bohemond iv antioch soon joined crusaders however hundreds crusaders soon returned europe famine following previous year poor harvest war council held tent andrew ii considered supreme commander crusader army leaders particularly john acknowledge andrew leadership crusaders raided nearby territory ruled al adil food unk forcing sultan retreat november 1217 december john besieged ayyubid fortress mount unk joined bohemond iv antioch unable capture encouraged unk according contemporary jacques de unk

2008 bahrain grand prix
2008 bahrain grand prix formally v gulf air bahrain grand prix formula one motor race held 6 april 2008 bahrain international circuit sakhir bahrain third race 2008 formula one season 57 lap race felipe massa ferrari team kimi räikkönen second ferrari bmw sauber driver robert kubica third
race began kubica pole position alongside massa lewis hamilton eventual drivers champion started third alongside räikkönen kubica passed massa first corner räikkönen third lap ferraris dominated front race leading one two finish hamilton slow start almost stalling grid dropped back ninth mclaren driver ran back fernando alonso renault lap later breaking mclaren front wing dropping hamilton back field
kubica strong finish promoted bmw sauber lead constructors championship bmw driver nick heidfeld finished fourth ferrari mclaren trailed one two points behind respectively räikkönen took lead drivers championship 19 points three points ahead heidfeld five ahead hamilton kubica kovalainen 15 races remaining season
